ygData.subject: RE: Brass or  Wind???
ygData.msgSnippet: no its a good thing not to dance, definitely.  yes the brass horn goes right through my brain hehe. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
no its a good thing not to dance, definitely. yes the brass horn goes right
through my brain hehe.

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 12:03 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Brass or Wind???
>
>
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> On Sun, 25 Jul 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
> >
> > Any other female wood elf bards out there? I don't do the
> funky dance when
> > i sing winf instruments, just kinda bob my head around.
>
> And this is a bad thing? :-) I use a minotaur horn just to
> avoid bobbing my head around too.
>
> When you're using a brass horn with a brass song, do you end
> up putting the wide end of the horn through your face?
>
> --
